metadata.title: CVE-2022-42703 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - high
metadata.description: mm/rmap.c in the Linux kernel before 5.19.7 has a use-after-free related toleaf anon_vma double reuse.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
